name: Divine Miracle Defense
description: Divine Miracle Defense is an tower defense game with an magic theme and few roguelike which make it very unique. You have to build an defense line with mages and upgrade them to stay alive as long as possible. when you die, you get a few special points depending on how long you survived.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32/64bit Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32/64bit Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
